CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Employees"), "Employees; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Spouse"), "Spouse; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Dependents U18"), "Dependents U18; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Dependents 18+"), "Dependents 18+; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Employees w/o Medical"), "Employees w/o Medical; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Patients"), "Patients; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Retirees"), "Retirees; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Secondary Insurance"), "Secondary Insurance; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Direct to Consumer (D2C)"), "Direct to Consumer (D2C); ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Pre-65 Retirees"), "Pre-65 Retirees; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Cobra"), "Cobra; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Diabetes Under 13"), "Diabetes Under 13; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Population_of_Coverage__c , "Union Population"), "Union Population; ", NULL)
